item.title: Linux Compression Tool
item.description: ubuntu 22.04默认安装 pigz pigz : 是gzip的并行实现，是gzip的全功能替代品，它在压缩数据时充分利用多个处理器和多个内核。 tar with pigz # uncompress tar -I pigz -xf <filename.tar.gz> #

item.title: Useful linux commands
item.description: create sudo enabled user # add a new user to the system sudo adduser <username> # adding the user to the sudo group sudo usermod -aG sudo <username> # testing sudo access sudo su - <username> run sudo command without a password sudo visudo # change under line to next line # %sudo ALL=(ALL:ALL) ALL %sudo ALL=(ALL:ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL install miniconda wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-py38_4.12.0-Linux-x86_64.sh bash Miniconda3-py38_4.12.0-Linux-x86_64.sh init miniconda # cd to conda install path .
